definition: South Korea (Republic of Korea)/Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄[zhan4 guo2 qi1 xiong2]/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

pinyin: Han2 guo2 Lian2 he2 Tong1 xun4 she4

definition: Daniel Han Kuo-yu (1957-), Taiwanese KMT politician, mayor of Kaohsiung since 2018

sentences.english: The South Korean government spends millions promoting contemporary Korean culture abroad.
sentences.chinese: 韓國政府花了數百萬的錢推廣當代韓國文化。

sentences.english: The South Korean government spends millions promoting contemporary Korean culture abroad.
sentences.chinese: 韓國政府花了數百萬的錢推廣當代韓國文化。

sentences.english: " Moreover, the commission also chides South Korea for not embracing its "important" initiative.
sentences.chinese: 此外，該委員會還指責韓國不接受其“重要”倡議。

sentences.english: Cartrider bicycle created by Korean designer Jaebeom Jeong.
sentences.chinese: 韓國設計師設計的由超市購物車改裝成的自行車。

sentences.english: North Korea also prohibited reunions between North and South Korean families.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮作爲報復停止了讓朝鮮和韓國失散家庭團聚。

sentences.english: The North views Southern pamphleteering as hostile propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮認爲韓國的傳單爲惡意宣傳。

sentences.english: They have cooked and compared North and South Korean dishes.
sentences.chinese: 一起做菜，對比朝鮮和韓國菜。

sentences.english: And now the South Koreans say they have evidence of what amounts to an act of war.
sentences.chinese: 韓國稱他們擁有相當於“戰爭性攻擊行爲”的證據。

sentences.english: Koreans all cheat and plagiarize in universities.
sentences.chinese: 韓國人在大學裏沒幾個不作弊和剽竊。

sentences.english: Choi, hailing from the country that first created this television formula, obviously knows well what audiences expect.
sentences.chinese: 來自此類節目創始國韓國的崔始源深諳觀衆的期待。

sentences.english: Circumstances, we come to the connection of the South Korean journalists stationed Zhang Ling.
sentences.chinese: 具體情況，我們來連線本臺駐韓國記者張玲。
神話尚未結束，韓國團結一心。

sentences.english: South Korea, in particular, dreads the cost of rebuilding the North.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是韓國，對於重建北方的花銷心存畏懼。

sentences.english: I don't like Korean dishes so much.
sentences.chinese: 我一點都不喜歡韓國菜。

sentences.english: The security guard of the apartment did not enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy.
sentences.chinese: 公寓保安人員沒有進入韓國駐華使館領事部。
